envy.question: Have I secretly wished others' blessings, achievements, or successes were not so great, in order to feel better about my own life?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others using language that was unbecoming of me?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I indulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, thereby weakening my resolve to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures that neglects the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs or faults
through casual conversations during breaks or social gatherings
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs or faults, even if what I shared was true, through casual conversations during breaks or social gatherings?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when it could have been avoided ,
pride.question: Did I engage in work on a Sunday when it could have been avoided, causing others to bear the burden of my responsibilities or making them have to work on that day of rest?
pride.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: for something other than rest , worship , or relaxation when it could have been avoided
impiety.question: Did I use my free time on a Sunday for something other than rest, worship, or relaxation when it could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impurity.question: Have I used substances, practices, or objects to intentionally prevent pregnancy within marriage?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
